text: Mike Allan MacDonald (June 21, 1954 - March 17, 2018) was a Canadian stand-up comedian and actor. He wrote and appeared in several movies, including Mr. Nice Guy. MacDonald also appeared in such television shows as the Late Show with David Letterman and The Arsenio Hall Show. MacDonald had bipolar disorder, and he supported the advocacy group Standup for Mental Health.
